# UIPrintInfo.Duplex

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe the duplex mode of a selected printer.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Duplex
```

## Overview

You use these constants when setting the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInfo/duplex-swift.property] property of a `UIPrintInfo` object.

## Constants

- **UIPrintInfo.Duplex.none**: No double-sided (duplex) printing; single-sided printing only.
- **UIPrintInfo.Duplex.longEdge**: Duplex printing that flips the back page along the long edge of the paper.
- **UIPrintInfo.Duplex.shortEdge**: Duplex print that flips the back page along the short edge of the paper.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing print-job attributes

- **duplex**: The duplex mode to use for the print job.
- **jobName**: The name of the print job.
- **orientation**: The orientation of the printed content, portrait or landscape.
- **UIPrintInfo.Orientation**: Constants that describe the orientation of printing on a page.
- **outputType**: The kind of printable content.
- **UIPrintInfo.OutputType**: Constants that describe the output type, which is an indication of the type of content the app is drawing or providing.
- **printerID**: An identifier of the printer to use for the print job.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
